description: '''Les Jumo'''  (a phonetic way of writing ''Les Jumeaux'' in [[French language|French]], {{IPA|fr|le Ê’ymo|}}, meaning ''The Twins'') is a French singing and dancing duo with strong African influences formed in 2008 by the twin brothers known as '''Docta Lova La Friandiz''' and '''Linho de Gaucho L'International''' born 16 October 1985. They used the shortened '''Docta & Linho''' for some credits.
